descriptionHtml:
This is a twohanded axe which can be found at the small ritual site west of Roadside Ruin near Falkreath.

It uses a custom model and textures. The texture size is 2048x2048.

Stats:

Damage: 18
Weight: 14
Value: 100

It has the same damage as the steel battleaxe, but its way faster.

Story:

This scythe once belonged to a serf from Falkreath. Having four sons, two daughters and a sick wife he struggled to feed them all. So he turned to Clavicus Vile to help him out. He sent out Barbas to lure innocent citizens from Falkreath into the woods, who were then slaughtered by the serf. Their meat went on the table of his ignorant family. The rest of the remains were offered to Clavicus Vile as a sacrifice.

One day, while the serf was offering the remains, he was surprised by his youngest son, who had followed him and wanted to confront him about his actions. Knowing he could not explain the situation he did what he had started to think was right: he killed his son, cut off his meat and sacrificed his remains to his only master. On that very evening he ate more than usual...Â
author: Kelretu
